content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Good afternoon, Ryanah. Thank you for your interest in the apartment. Based on the size and location of the apartment, we are looking for a rental price of $1,500 per month. Is that within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I have to say that it is a little bit more than I can afford. I am a student and I need to save money for my school. So, I would like to negotiate. Can you offer a lower price?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I understand your situation, Ryanah. Unfortunately, we are not able to offer a lower price for the apartment at this time. However, we are open to discussing alternative options with you, such as a shorter lease term or additional responsibilities for maintenance and utilities. Would you be interested in discussing these options with me?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, I will consider those options. Can you tell me more about the lease term and the responsibilities for maintenance and utilities?

Regarding the lease term, how long is it and what would be the consequences of breaking it early?

Regarding the responsibilities for maintenance and utilities, can you tell me how much I will be responsible for paying?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Sure, Ryanah. The lease term for the apartment is one year, with a renewal option for an additional year. If you were to break the lease early, you would be responsible for paying the remaining rent for the remainder of the lease term.

As for the responsibilities for maintenance and utilities, you would be responsible for paying for any damages caused by you or your guests, as well as any additional utilities that you use beyond what is included in the monthly rent. The monthly rent includes basic utilities such as electricity, water, and gas, but you would be responsible for any additional charges such as internet or cable.

Let me know if you have any further questions or if there is anything else I can help with.
name: Heinrich Heine
